item.title: Rudy Giuliani satisfies Fulton County election workers' $148 million defamation case
item.description: Former New York City mayor Rudy Giuliani was found liable for defamation in 2023 and ordered to pay two election workers $148 million -- which has now...

item.title: 21 employees of department renamed DOGE resign in protest
item.description: Twenty-one federal employees who previously worked for the U.S. Digital Service before it was renamed the U.S. DOGE Service have resigned in protest o...

item.title: Federal judge rules Trump administration has to pay millions in foreign aid
item.description: Judge Amir Ali said the Trump administration violated a court order about foreign aid and is ordering them to pay millions to nonprofits.

item.title: Southwest plane has close call with business jet while landing
item.description: A Southwest Airlines plane landed safely at Chicago Midway International Airport after a close call with a business jet.

item.title: WATCH: Video shows close call between a Southwest plane and a business jet while landing
